title: Simpsons Roasting on an Open Fire
synopsis: After Homer and Marge spend their Christmas savings getting Bart's tattoo removed, Homer takes a department-store Santa job and later enters Santa's Little Helper in a dog race to try to save the family's holiday.

title: Bart the Genius
synopsis: Bart swaps answer sheets with Martin to get into a school for gifted children, but he cannot keep up and eventually confesses that he cheated.

title: Homer's Odyssey
synopsis: After being fired from the Springfield Nuclear Power Plant, Homer falls into depression and briefly considers suicide before becoming a safety crusader and then getting his old job back.

title: There's No Disgrace Like Home
synopsis: Embarrassed by his family's behavior at a company picnic, Homer drags everyone to Dr. Marvin Monroe for family therapy.

title: Bart the General
synopsis: After Nelson keeps bullying him, Bart enlists Grampa's help and organizes neighborhood kids for a showdown that ends the harassment.

title: Moaning Lisa
synopsis: Lisa struggles with unexplained sadness until she meets Bleeding Gums Murphy, who helps her express herself through jazz.

title: The Call of the Simpsons
synopsis: Homer buys an RV and takes the family camping, where they get stranded and Homer is mistaken for Bigfoot after a mud bath.

title: The Telltale Head
synopsis: Trying to impress older kids, Bart saws off the Jebediah Springfield statue head, then regrets it when the town reacts in outrage.

title: Life on the Fast Lane
synopsis: After getting a bowling ball as a birthday gift, Marge takes lessons from Jacques and considers an affair before deciding to stay with Homer.

title: Homer's Night Out
synopsis: Bart's spy camera captures Homer dancing with Princess Kashmir, and when the photo spreads Homer must rebuild trust with Marge.

title: The Crepes of Wrath
synopsis: Bart joins a student exchange in France and is exploited by vineyard owners, then helps expose their wine fraud and receives praise at home.

title: Krusty Gets Busted
synopsis: After Krusty is framed for robbery, Bart and Lisa investigate and prove Sideshow Bob committed the crime.

title: Some Enchanted Evening
synopsis: When Homer and Marge go out, the kids are babysat by the feared Babysitter Bandit, whom Maggie ultimately subdues.
